text: Gustav Arne Carlsson (born 5 January 1943) is a Swedish former ice hockey defenceman. Carlsson competed at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble, France.Arne Carlsson. hockey-reference.com He previously played for Södertälje SK, Frölunda HC, and Almtuna IS in the Swedish Elite League.Society for International Hockey Research Database, retrieved 29 June 2015 ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Sweden Category:Sportspeople from Uppsala Category:Swedish ice hockey defencemen
title: Arne Carlsson (ice hockey)
